ygData.subject: Gnome Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t explored it fully but if you kill the cat people on the Island in Erudin s Crossing, you will gain with one of the gnome factions. I think the
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't explored it fully but if you kill the cat people on the Island in
Erudin's Crossing, you will gain with one of the gnome factions. I think the
eldrich collective. So there may be things on Kerra Island on Erudin etc
that can help faction with gnomes. The game map appears to be acting like
you could move from erudin to steamfont even though there is no active zone.

Sincerely,

Mortifer - MoltenLava

AKA - Eloric D'Mortifer - Necromancer
- Veneficus - Magician
- Mortifer - Wizard
